trustfund:
TF053140-PHRD-NICARAGUA: HEALTH SECTOR
            MODERNIZATION PROJECT (SECOND PHASE OF AN

abstracts.cdata!:
The Health Services Extension and
            Modernization Project for Nicaragua aims at improving health
            outcomes in Nicaragua, particularly among the poor, by
            raising the efficiency, effectiveness, equity and
            sustainability of the Nicaraguan health system. The
            Government of Nicaragua has prepared a stand alone
            environmental assessment which contains a general objective,
            a methodology, legal framework and a health care waste
            management plan, which also includes an institutional
            framework for its implementation, an overview of the current
            practices on handling health care waste, a strategy and an
            action plan to improve the management of health care waste
            on selected facilities, indicators, training materials,
            environmental mitigation measures, lessons learned,
            conclusions, schedule, budget and bibliography.
